version_description:
• Support for adding images to passes.
• Updated color picker.
• Updated date picker for with better macOS support.

• Support for adding images to passes.
• Option to save or share passes as pass files.
• Option to open and edit pass files.
• Updated camera barcode capture with macOS support.
• Updated date picker for with better macOS support.
• Updated color picker.

• Support for adding images to passes.
• Option to save or share passes as pass files.
• Option to open and edit pass files.
• Updated camera barcode capture with macOS support.
• Updated date picker for with better macOS support.
• Updated color picker.

• Support for adding images to passes.
• Option to save or share passes as pass files.
• Option to open and edit pass files.
• Updated camera barcode capture with macOS support.
• Updated date picker for with better macOS support.
• Updated color picker.

MakePass 1.7.3
• Support for setting colors as an hex values.

MakePass 1.7
• Option to save or share passes as pass files.
• Option to open and edit pass files.
• Updated camera barcode capture with macOS support.

MakePass 1.8
• New location picker with support for multiple locations, pin dragging, current location zoom and search support!
• Added color picker on the Touch Bar on macOS.

MakePass 1.7
• Option to save or share passes as pass files.
• Option to open and edit pass files and templates.
• New color picker with option to set colors as an hex values.
• Updated camera barcode capture with macOS support.

MakePass 1.8
• New location picker with support for multiple locations, pin dragging, current location zoom and search support!
• Support for setting pass back fields.
• Better image resizing and support for generating pass images with @2x and @3x resolution.
• Added a Touch Bar color picker on macOS.
